EmailTemplate.description: [EBH] (EPH-4159) : Email template to notify Contract Admin team on contract status change to 'Ready for Ebay signature'. Updated 20180710
EmailTemplate.name: Contract Ready for eBay Signature Notification2
EmailTemplate.subject: Your Contract {!Contract.ContractNumber} for Site {!Contract.EBH_Site__c} is Ready for eBay Signature
